defaults.description: Settings that are applied onto every suite by default, if no value is set on a suite explicitly.

env.description: Set one or more environment variables. Values can be environment variables themselves.

mode.description: Instructs saucectl run tests remotely through Sauce Labs (sauce) or locally on docker.

rootDir.description: The directory of files that need to be bundled and uploaded for the tests to run.

timeout.description: Instructs how long (in ms, s, m, or h) saucectl should wait for a suite to complete.
